episodeTitle: The Deadliest Weapon of Mass Destruction in History! Shinokuni!
description: Caesar Clown demonstrates his ultimate weapon as Smiley consumes poisoned candy and transforms into the deadly Shinokuni gas. The Straw Hats flee from the spreading petrifying poison as they witness the first on-screen Devil Fruit reincarnation.

events.title: Caesar Reveals Punk Hazard's Destruction
events.description: Caesar Clown narrates how he killed Punk Hazard four years ago using the H2S gas bomb. He explains that Smiley is the H2S bomb given life through a Devil Fruit, setting the stage for his weapon demonstration.
events.significance: Reveals the dark history of Punk Hazard and establishes Caesar's cruel methodology of creating weapons of mass destruction.

quotes.text: Four years ago, I killed this island with the H2S bomb!
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown
quotes.context: Caesar explains the origins of his weapon demonstration

events.title: Smiley Disobeys and Eats the Candy
events.description: Despite Caesar telling Smiley to wait, the creature eagerly consumes the oversized candy. A chemical reaction immediately begins building up inside Smiley's body, causing it to act erratically.
events.significance: This moment triggers the transformation of Smiley into the Shinokuni weapon, marking a point of no return for everyone on Punk Hazard.

quotes.text: Not yet, Smiley! You can't eat the candy just yet!
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown
quotes.context: Caesar's failed attempt to control Smiley's eagerness

events.title: Death of Smiley
events.description: Smiley begins to dissolve after consuming the poisoned candy, letting out a final roar before its body completely breaks down and reverts to gas form. This marks the death of the sentient poison creature.
events.significance: The death of Smiley creates the Shinokuni weapon and provides the first animated demonstration of Devil Fruit reincarnation in the series.

events.title: First On-Screen Devil Fruit Reincarnation
events.description: As Smiley dies, one of the fruits in a nearby sled suddenly transforms, bearing the distinctive spiral markings of a Devil Fruit. The Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl reincarnates into an apple, confirming the theory of Devil Fruit rebirth.
events.significance: This is the first time in the anime that viewers witness Devil Fruit reincarnation happening in real-time, revealing a fundamental mystery about how Devil Fruits work in the One Piece world.

events.title: Shinokuni Weapon Unveiled
events.description: The gas from Smiley's dissolved body transforms into Shinokuni, a deadly petrifying poison gas that spreads across the island. Caesar reveals this is his new ultimate weapon - an improved version that doesn't just paralyze victims but completely petrifies them.
events.significance: Establishes Shinokuni as one of the most dangerous weapons introduced in the series, raising the stakes for everyone trapped on Punk Hazard.

quotes.text: Before, my gas weapon could only paralyze the victim but left them alive. However, I created a new type of gas that turns the victim's body to ash and paralyzes them completely!
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown
quotes.context: Caesar celebrates the unveiling of Shinokuni

events.title: First Victim of Shinokuni
events.description: One of the centaurs is caught in the spreading Shinokuni gas and is instantly petrified, demonstrating the weapon's horrific effectiveness. The victim's body turns to ash-like stone, completely immobilized.
events.significance: Demonstrates the immediate lethality of Shinokuni and creates urgency for all characters to escape the spreading gas.

events.title: Straw Hats' Desperate Escape Begins
events.description: The Straw Hat Pirates and their allies begin fleeing from the spreading Shinokuni gas. The group splits between different locations as they race toward the laboratory for safety.
events.significance: Creates the central conflict and tension for the episode as the heroes must outrun a deadly weapon while coordinating their escape.

events.title: Sanji, Zoro, Brook, and Kin'emon Catch the Dragon
events.description: Sanji, Zoro, Brook, and Kin'emon successfully catch up to the flying dragon that had been carrying some of their allies, joining forces for the escape.
events.significance: Shows the teamwork and coordination of the Straw Hats as they regroup during the crisis.

events.title: Lab Shutters Begin to Close
events.description: As the Straw Hats approach Caesar's laboratory for safety, the iron shutter doors begin closing, threatening to trap them outside with the deadly Shinokuni gas.
events.significance: Creates a ticking clock scenario that raises tension and forces immediate action from the crew.

events.title: Kin'emon and Zoro Cut Through Iron Shutters
events.description: Working together, Kin'emon and Zoro use their swordsmanship to slice through the heavy iron shutters, creating an opening for Brownbeard to burst through with the others.
events.significance: Demonstrates the power of teamwork between two master swordsmen and enables the group's escape from the Shinokuni gas.

events.title: All Allies Reach the Laboratory
events.description: All of the Straw Hats and their allies successfully make it inside Caesar's laboratory just before the Shinokuni gas can reach them. Everyone is accounted for and safe for the moment.
events.significance: Marks the end of the immediate escape sequence and sets up the next phase of the conflict with Caesar.

events.title: Luffy Declares Readiness for Counterattack
events.description: With everyone safely inside the laboratory, Luffy confirms that all his allies are present and declares they are ready to begin their counterattack against Caesar Clown.
events.significance: Marks the transition from defense to offense, setting up the upcoming confrontation with Caesar and his forces.

quotes.text: Everyone is here! Let's begin the counterattack!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy rallies the group after their successful escape

quotes.text: Four years ago, I killed this island with the H2S bomb!
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown
quotes.context: Explaining the origins of Punk Hazard's devastation

quotes.text: Before, my gas weapon could only paralyze the victim but left them alive. However, I created a new type of gas that turns the victim's body to ash and paralyzes them completely!
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown

quotes.text: Everyone is here! Let's begin the counterattack!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Rallying allies after reaching safety in the laboratory

themes.description: The episode focuses on the Straw Hats' desperate race against time to escape the spreading Shinokuni gas, emphasizing their resourcefulness and teamwork in the face of deadly danger.
themes.symbolism: The spreading poison gas represents the creeping threat of weapons of mass destruction and the callousness of those who create them.

themes.description: Caesar's pride in creating an even deadlier version of his weapon showcases the dangers of unchecked scientific experimentation without moral constraints.
themes.symbolism: Smiley's death and transformation into Shinokuni symbolizes how scientific discoveries can be corrupted into instruments of mass death.
culturalReferences: References to real-world weapons of mass destruction and chemical warfare

themes.description: The first on-screen Devil Fruit reincarnation reveals one of the fundamental mysteries of the One Piece world, showing that Devil Fruits follow natural laws of rebirth.
themes.symbolism: The transformation of a normal apple into a Devil Fruit represents the cycle of death and rebirth inherent in Devil Fruit mechanics.

characterSpotlights.development: Caesar's sadistic nature is on full display as he gleefully demonstrates his weapon of mass destruction, showing no remorse for the lives that will be lost.
keyActions: Narrates the history of Punk Hazard's destruction
Celebrates the petrification of his first victim
quotes: Four years ago, I killed this island with the H2S bomb!
Before, my gas weapon could only paralyze the victim but left them alive. However, I created a new type of gas that turns the victim's body to ash and paralyzes them completely!

characterSpotlights.development: Smiley's death reveals the creature was merely a tool for Caesar's ambitions, sacrificed without hesitation to create an even deadlier weapon.
keyActions: Dissolves and dies, transforming into Shinokuni gas

characterSpotlights.development: Luffy takes charge during the crisis, ensuring everyone reaches safety and preparing to shift from defense to offense.
quotes: Everyone is here! Let's begin the counterattack!

characterSpotlights.development: Zoro demonstrates his swordsmanship by cutting through the iron shutters alongside Kin'emon, showing effective teamwork.
keyActions: Works with Kin'emon to cut through iron shutters
Helps secure the group's escape route

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extended the scenes of the Straw Hats fleeing from Shinokuni with additional action sequences and character reactions not present in the manga.
The visual depiction of the Devil Fruit reincarnation was more detailed in the anime, showing the transformation process more clearly.

trivia.fact: This episode marks the first time in the One Piece anime that Devil Fruit reincarnation is shown on-screen, a significant reveal about the mechanics of Devil Fruits.
The Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl reincarnated into an apple, suggesting Devil Fruits may reincarnate into the nearest compatible fruit.

sources.title: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: Episode 602 adapts Chapter 676 of the manga, titled 'The Perfect Weapon of Slaughter'.
Shinokuni's name translates to 'Land of Death' in English, reflecting its lethal nature.
The episode aired on June 30, 2013 in Japan, with the US simulcast airing one day earlier on June 29, 2013.
